citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00a on
27-JUN-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility and spoke with a family member. The family member stated that the licensee was
not home and no one was available that could do the inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00a on
27-JUN-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility and spoke with a family member.  The family member stated that the licensee was
not home and no one was available that could do the inspection.
